title: Simplify 3D
description:
I've personally had enough of S3D's Totalitarian DRM policy and have decided to force their hand into fixing it, I vow to crack and share every version of S3D they release until they relax the DRM and stop causing good paying customers to have to go through all the headache. 


1. Install the program.
2. Copy Loader to the program directory - something like C:Program FilesSimplify 3D 3.0.2
3. Change the desktop shortcut to point to the loader. 
4. Happy printing! :)


compiled with visual studio so you may need to download the Visual C++ redistributable.

Sometimes the Loader may be too slow and fail to initiate the program. In that case just execute it again.
Tested on windows 8&10
